About Me

Let me Show you what I can do

BIO

Age 24, I’m always eager to learn something new everyday to become a versatile in software engineering and in life one day. During my free time I'm occupied by trying different handicrafts. I would describe myself as adaptable and always giving everything to do a job, so I know I gave my best.

Cluster Ry, Lappeenranta

International Representative

My responsibility is to communicate with the international students of Cluster, to advocate for them and to uphold the internationality of Cluster. In addition, I was a Tutor for exchange students in the autumn of 2022, assisting 6 exchange students from multiple different countries.

Lappeenrannan Teknillinen Yliopisto LUT

Teacher assistant, Ohjelmistotuotanto

I worked with two other assistants, supporting the students in understanding the course assignments, and gave the initial assessments of their weekly tasks and project work.

Tamoils Oy, Helsinki

Palvelumestari(Service station worker)

Worked as a service master in the forecourt, serving on average 40 cars per shift and selling additional products. Learned to handle a wide range of different customers and was very successful in giving satisfactory results.

Finnish Defence Forces, Kaartin Jääkärirykmentti

3D-Modeler and Virtual training environment unit(Conscript)
Virtual Training environment VKY

I worked a total of 7 months, but my work was put on a break for a few months in the early stages for participating in the NCO course.
